plant.csoundcode: opcode RandomiseGrid,0,S SIn xin iCnt init 0 until iCnt > 128 do S2 sprintfk "%sgridChannel%d", SIn, iCnt+1 iValue random 0, 100 chnset iValue<50 ? 0 : 1, S2 iCnt=iCnt+1 iCntRows = (iCnt%10==0 ? iCntRows+1 : iCntRows) enduntil endop
